text: The current national flag of Belarus was introduced on June 7, 1995. This new design replaced a historical flag used by the Belarusian People's Republic of 1918. The current flag is a change of the 1951 flag. The flag has a red upper stripe and a green lower stripe. A vertical red and white pattern is against the flagstaff. Belarus Category:National symbols of Belarus Category:Flags with green, red and white
title: Flag of Belarus
